title: EM induction - bar magnet falls through wire coil

content.prompt: A resistor is connected across the two ends of the coil. What current would be produced in the coil, as observed by a person directly above the coil?

choices.label: A current that is first clockwise and then counterclockwise
A current that is first counterclockwise and then clockwise
